# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/pouchdb-core`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for pouchdb-core v5.4.4 (https://pouchdb.com/).

Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/types-2.0/pouchdb-core
